items.sentence: Tom had difficulty convincing Mary that she should quit her job.

I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me he didn\'t have to do that.

Tom wants to live in Boston after he graduates from high school.
Tom was a little taller than I was when we were in grade school.

Tom doesn\'t like being cooped up in his small office every day.
